title: The Second Coming of Jesus Reveals the Mystery of Faith in God | "Faith in God" Gospel Movie Trailer

json.text: Get over here! You are done for now! Catch him! Come on! Hurry!
It's hard for us to believe in God in China.
Every time we gather, we're at risk for getting arrested.
Hurry!
If we didn't have faith or wouldn't give up our lives for the Lord,
this path would be hard.
The CCP is still wantonly persecuting believers in God.
Their evildoings really fill people with rage.
Yeah.
How do we treat the ruling authority?
How do we make sure we're in accordance with the Lord's will?
Paul said,
Obeying the regimes is obeying the Lord.
But the evil CCP, they ban us from spreading the Lord's gospel.
You would still obey them?
The CCP is atheistic.
Atheists are in power, so Satan is in power.
God never said that man should obey Satan.
Since we believe in the Lord, we must listen to His words and obey Him. (Amen!)
Amen.
The Lord Jesus has returned as Almighty God.
Almighty God, He is expressing truth and doing His work of judgment,
shocking the religious world.
The Eastern Lightning's preaching goes beyond the limits of the Bible.
So we can't accept it!
We must keep the words of the Bible.
We believe in the Lord, act according to the Bible.
Leaving the Bible's leaving the Lord. (Amen!)
Back then, the Jewish chief priests, scribes, and Pharisees
followed and kept the Bible in their faith in God.
But why did they still crucify the Lord Jesus to the cross?
If we didn't truly believe in the Lord,
could we have withstood all of that suffering,
borne our crosses, and followed the Lord?
Would we rather suffer in jail than ever deny the Lord's name and betray Him?
Our faith in the Lord will obtain His praise.
When the Lord comes, He'll bring us to the kingdom of heaven. (Amen.)
Whether believers can gain His praise
doesn't depend on how much they work or how much they suffer;
it just depends on if they practice God's words or obey Him.
Since we believe in the Lord, we must accept the return of the Lord Jesus.
If we don't accept His return,
we will be forsaken.
What does it mean to have true faith in God?
How to believe in God so as to gain His approval?
By going through Almighty God's many judgments, chastisements,
my viewpoint of faith in Him has changed.
Thank God for His mercy. Praise God.
I've started to pursue and practice the truth.
At last, I'm on the right track of faith for salvation.
Praise God! Amen!
This is the result of experiencing Almighty God's judgment in the last days!
Amen!
